text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me bob..
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hey Kids! Welcome to Bob’s Learning Street! Let’s meet the vowels today!”
Do you know without the vowels there'd be no stories or novels you could not write a word they’re simply unavoidable
No without the vowels there'd be no stories or novels you could not write a word they’re simply unavoidable
A E I O U
“There are five vowels a e i o and u”

A is found All Around It makes the a a ae ae sound and when you find it all alone
It means a single one
“The letter ‘a’ by itself means one. ‘a’ ball means one ball!”
Next the vowel E you stretch your mouth like this you see

Alone it’s often heard as ‘ae’ 
But a double E makes an ‘ee’
I can be short or long bit and Bite make different sounds
But when it’s standing all alone I always means Me
“I, Me and Myself, all mean the same thing!”
Do you know without the vowels there'd be no stories or novels You could not write a word they’re simply unavoidable
Do you know without the vowels there'd be no stories or novels You could not write a word they’re simply unavoidable
A E I O U

When you make your mouth round
You can make the O sound

And it’s so easy to spot
It’s just a line going around
U can make you confused Uh Uh Up but You in Union
But don’t vowels get you down Cos they are so much fun
Do you know without the vowels there'd be no stories or novels you could not write a word they’re simply unavoidable
Do you know without the vowels there'd be no stories or novels you could not write a word they’re simply unavoidable
A E I O U
